title: Strategic Mindset
author: Thibaut Meurisse
description: In Strategic Mindset, you’ll learn how to gain clarity regarding what you want and to identify highly effective strategies to achieve your goals. Each day, you’ll be provided with a simple exercise to develop a powerful strategy that will help you reach all your goals.

title: Read People Like a Book
author: Patrick King
description: Read People Like a Book isn't about simple body language cues or tips you can learn in minutes. This book offers a deeper understanding of human behavior, psychology, and the subtle signals people constantly give off. Learn how to decode people's thoughts, emotions, and intentions using psychology-based strategies.

title: Focus on the Process
author: Thibaut Meurisse
description:
Do you dream big but struggle to follow through? Do you start projects with excitement, only to abandon them halfway? Are you constantly searching for the “next big thing” to finally succeed?

The problem isn’t your goals—it’s your process.

The truth is, success isn’t about quick fixes or shortcuts. It’s about following the right process. The process is the real goal, and the results you want are simply the natural outcome.

In Focus on the Process, author Thibaut Meurisse helps you approach your goals differently. By shifting your focus from outcomes to the daily actions that drive success, you’ll finally build momentum and achieve what once felt impossible.

title: Tinkle Double Double Digest
author: Thindiath
description: If you can never get enough of stories in Tinkle and the Tinkle Digest, then the Tinkle Double Double Digest is for you! With 350+ pages of the best that Tinkle has to offer, you are in for a rollercoaster of a ride through tales of adventure, mystery, fantasy, hilarity and more. Read stories of all your favourite Tinkle Toons, from Suppandi, Shambu and Kalia the Crow to Tantri the Mantri, Nasruddin Hodja, Anwar and many, many more.

title: Master Your Learning
author: Thibaut Meurisse
description:
Struggle to remember what you learn? Wish you could learn faster? Want to master new skills?
If so, it’s time for you to master the learning process and become an unstoppable learner.

Author and coach, Thibaut Meurisse, wants you to become a highly effective learner. In his latest book, you’ll discover the best learning techniques so that you can master any skills you desire and become a life-long learner.

title: Do the Impossible
author: Thibaut Meurisse
description: In 'Do the Impossible', Thibaut Meurisse guides you to break through limiting beliefs, unlock your full potential, and achieve what others think is impossible. This book is your blueprint for turning extraordinary dreams into reality by adopting an unstoppable mindset and taking consistent, focused action.

title: Tinkle Origin
author: Tinkle Editorial Team
description: Tinkle Origin is a delightful collection of stories that trace the beginnings of your favorite Tinkle characters. Dive into tales of mischief, bravery, and humor featuring Shambu, Suppandi, Tantri the Mantri and more. Perfect for new readers and long-time fans who want to explore where it all began.
